name: searchFlights
description: Searches for available flights based on user criteria.

departureCity.description: The city or airport code for departure.

arrivalCity.description: The city or airport code for arrival.

departureDate.description: The departure date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

returnDate.description: The return date in YYYY-MM-DD format (optional for one-way trips).

city.description: The city where to search for hotels.

checkInDate.description: The check-in date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

checkOutDate.description: The check-out date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

name: getAttractions
description: Finds attractions and points of interest in a specific city.

city.description: The city to search for attractions.

pickupDate.description: The pickup date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

dropoffDate.description: The dropoff date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

name: planDayItinerary
description: Creates a detailed, time-slotted itinerary for a single day of the trip.

date.description: The date for the itinerary in YYYY-MM-DD format.

activities.description: A list of activities or attractions to include.

startTime.description: The start time for the day's plan (e.g., '09:00').

endTime.description: The end time for the day's plan (e.g., '22:00').
